title: Graphics
body: make more options with graphics since youre updating them with every patch my frames drop 10 by 10 every time now when i hit team fights i get 6 fps on lowest settings.... i cant do much with that. x.x {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
The patches haven't overhauled anything with the graphics outside of new skins and animations for new champs (Kled). I recommend taking a look at the steps outlined in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) since there are common solutions in there for this issue.

Let me know if this helped.
